column4: Im going to upgrade from Warty to Hoary soon. Anything i can prepare for? Any tips?? I have some Backports installed...
get rid of all the backports
and remember not to use them ever again
really? will that break it?
but how do i get the latest software without them ?
you deal with not having software release five seconds ago, or you use the development version of ubuntu
what ?
which bit was confusing?
all of it
you deal with not having software release five seconds ago, ????
dude
ubuntu comes out every six months
waiting a few months for newer stuff will not kill you
what if there are features I want to use?
then use the development version of ubuntu
ill use backports thank you very much
even if they make it impossible to upgrade to the next version of ubuntu?
nothing is impossible, apt can do magic... ill fix it myself
you didnt tell me how to fix it
seriously, you have to remove them before you can upgrade
